name: Spaghetti Carbonara
how_to_cook: 1. Boil spaghetti in salted water until al dente, then drain.
2. Fry pancetta and garlic in a pan with a little oil until crispy.
3. Beat eggs in a bowl and mix with grated Parmesan cheese.
4. Add the drained spaghetti to the pancetta and remove from heat.
5. Quickly pour the egg mixture over the spaghetti and toss to coat.
6. Season with salt and black pepper, then serve immediately.

name: Chicken Curry
how_to_cook: 1. Chop onion, garlic, and tomatoes.
2. Heat oil in a pan, sauté onions and garlic until soft.
3. Add chicken pieces and cook until browned.
4. Add chopped tomatoes and curry powder, then cook for 5 minutes.
5. Pour in coconut milk and simmer on low heat for 20 minutes.
6. Season with salt to taste, then serve with rice.

name: Vegetable Stir Fry
how_to_cook: 1. Chop vegetables into bite-sized pieces.
2. Heat sesame oil in a pan over medium heat.
3. Add garlic and grated ginger, sauté for 1 minute.
4. Add the vegetables and stir-fry for 5–7 minutes until tender-crisp.
5. Pour in soy sauce and cook for another 2 minutes.
6. Serve hot with rice or noodles.

name: Beef Tacos
how_to_cook: 1. Brown the ground beef in a skillet over medium heat.
2. Add chopped onion and taco seasoning, cook for another 5 minutes.
3. While the beef cooks, chop lettuce and tomato.
4. Fill each taco shell with the cooked beef mixture.
5. Top with lettuce, tomato, and grated cheese.
6. Serve immediately with your favorite salsa or toppings.

name: Pancakes
how_to_cook: 1. In a bowl, mix the flour, sugar, and baking powder.
2. Whisk in the milk and egg until smooth.
3. Heat a little butter in a non-stick pan over medium heat.
4. Pour the batter into the pan, cooking each pancake until bubbles form on top.
5. Flip the pancake and cook until golden brown on both sides.
6. Serve with syrup, fruits, or any topping you prefer.

name: Caesar Salad
how_to_cook: 1. Chop the romaine lettuce and place it in a large salad bowl.
2. If using chicken, grill or pan-fry until cooked through, then slice it.
3. Toss the lettuce with croutons and Parmesan cheese.
4. Drizzle Caesar dressing over the top and toss again.
5. Top with the grilled chicken slices (if using) and serve immediately.

name: Tomato Soup
how_to_cook: 1. Chop the tomatoes, onion, and garlic.
2. Heat oil in a pot and sauté the onion and garlic until soft.
3. Add the chopped tomatoes and vegetable broth, and bring to a boil.
4. Lower the heat and simmer for 20 minutes.
5. Blend the soup until smooth, then return it to the heat.
6. Add cream if desired and season with salt and pepper to taste.

name: Banana Smoothie
how_to_cook: 1. Peel and slice the bananas.
2. Combine the bananas, milk, honey, and ice cubes in a blender.
3. Blend until smooth and creamy.
4. Pour into glasses and serve immediately.
